price: 147. Y lo enviamos (de regreso como mensajero) a unas cien mil personas, o más bien a más.
arabic: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِاْئَةِ أَلۡفٍ أَوۡ يَزِيدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-arsalnāhu ilā mi-ati alfin aw yazīdūna
